item.title: [PI] Demise's Stat Clicking System Updated[PI]
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

Ok ive updated Demise’s Stat CLicking system

New Features:
Now only Playerrights 3 can Use it
If a normal player clicks the skill it gives the interface
So players cannot use it

Files to use:
Only ClickingButtons.java

Okay lets start.

First do this Tutorial: http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/255510-pi-levelling-click.html

OPen clickingbuttons.java

Search for : case 33206:
You see something Like this:

[QUOTE]case 33206:
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.attackSkill = true;
break;
case 33209:
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.strengthSkill = true;
break;
case 33212:
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.defenceSkill = true;
break;
case 33215:
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.rangeSkill = true;
break;
case 33218:
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.prayerSkill = true;
break;
case 33221:
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.mageSkill = true;
break;
case 33207:
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.healthSkill = true;
break;[/QUOTE]

Replace that whole code With this:

[QUOTE]case 33206://Attack
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.attackSkill = true;
}
case 34142://Attack
if(c.playerRights == 0){
SkillGuides.atkInterface©;
}
break;
case 33209://str
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.strengthSkill = true;
}
case 34119://str
if(c.playerRights == 0){
SkillGuides.strInterface©;
}
break;
case 33212://deff
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.defenceSkill = true;
}
case 34120://Deff
if(c.playerRights == 0){
SkillGuides.defInterface©;
}
break;
case 33215://Range
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.rangeSkill = true;
}
case 34133: //Range
if(c.playerRights == 0){
SkillGuides.rangeInterface©;
}
break;
case 33218://Pray
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.prayerSkill = true;
}
case 34139: //Prayer
if(c.playerRights == 0){
SkillGuides.prayInterface©;
}
break;
case 33221://Magic
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.mageSkill = true;
}
case 34136: //Magic
if(c.playerRights == 0){
SkillGuides.mageInterface©;
break;
}
break;
case 33207://HP
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.outStream.createFrame(27);
c.healthSkill = true;
}
case 34123: //Hitpoints
if(c.playerRights == 0){
SkillGuides.hpInterface©;
break;
}
break;[/QUOTE]

Now ur done!

Repp Pl0x?:$:$:$
